volumeInfo.title: The Magic Tree House
volumeInfo.description: Jack and Annie discover a mysterious tree house filled with books that sends them on magical adventures through time and space.

volumeInfo.title: Where the Wild Things Are
volumeInfo.description: A young boy named Max enters a fantastic world of monsters after being sent to bed without dinner.

volumeInfo.title: Charlotte's Web
volumeInfo.description: A beautiful story of friendship between a pig named Wilbur and a spider named Charlotte.

volumeInfo.title: Percy Jackson & The Lightning Thief
volumeInfo.description: A young demigod discovers his heritage and embarks on a quest to prevent a war between the gods.

volumeInfo.title: Goodnight Moon
volumeInfo.description: A gentle bedtime story that has lulled generations of children to sleep.

volumeInfo.title: Wonder
volumeInfo.description: A heartwarming story about a boy with facial differences attending school for the first time.

volumeInfo.title: The Very Hungry Caterpillar
volumeInfo.description: Follow the journey of a tiny caterpillar as he eats his way through various foods before becoming a beautiful butterfly.

volumeInfo.title: Bridge to Terabithia
volumeInfo.description: A touching story of friendship and imagination between two fifth graders who create a magical forest kingdom.

volumeInfo.title: The Gruffalo
volumeInfo.description: A clever mouse takes a walk through the woods, using his wits to deter potential predators.

volumeInfo.title: Matilda
volumeInfo.description: A gifted young girl with special powers stands up against bullying adults and helps her teacher take back her school.

volumeInfo.title: The One and Only Ivan
volumeInfo.description: Based on a true story of a gorilla who lived in a mall, this touching tale explores friendship, art, and hope.

volumeInfo.title: Dragons Love Tacos
volumeInfo.description: A humorous story about dragons who love tacos but must avoid spicy salsa at all costs.
